name: Time of Flies
description:
Humans HATE flies!

Play as an innocent fly under attack by a furious human!

Get a high score by wrecking the human's kitchen!

Try not to lose your stamina by flying around aimlessly!

The human will accidentally wreak havoc in his own kitchen if the fly stays alive!

Stupid human!

CONTROLS:

WASD,

Mouse1 - Fly direction

Mouse2 - Camera direction

Spacebar - Fly Up

CTRL - Fly Down
